channel.title: Geopolitical Tensions on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Geopolitical Tensions on FinanClub

item.title: SE
item.description: score:-133 Chances: Growth stock investors could be in for an excellent year in 2024. Sea’s estimated fair value is US$73.00 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity. Risks: Geopolitical tensions between the United States and China as well as renewed conflict in the Middle East could impact Sea’s performance.

item.title: META
item.description: score:-42 Chances: The Federal Reserve raised interest rates at the fastest clip since the 1980s, which may affect the overall market sentiment and possibly impact the stock price of META. Spending on e-commerce and digital ads is expected to accelerate next year, which could benefit Meta Platforms and lead to potential gains in the stock.
